topic.title: Cand P Exam Request - conformance rules

section.p: This class includes information related to the 2507 request for Compensation & Pension Program.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] dateApproved with data type Point In Time
The date/time exam results were approved.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateCompleted with data type Point In Time
The date the entire 2507 request was completed.

Contains exactly one [1..1] examType with data type Code
Contains the name of the exam for the 2507 request.

Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Code
"A unique identifier for the Act." (HL7 3.0)

Contains exactly one [1..1] priority with data type Code
The request reason for the 2507 exam to be conducted. Possible values are TERMINAL; POW; ORIGINAL SC; ORIGINAL NSC; INCREASE; REVIEW; OTHER; INSUFFICIENT EXAM etc.
Contains exactly one [1..1] remarks with data type String

Contains exactly one [1..1] requestDate with data type Point In Time
The date the 2507 request was entered.

Contains exactly one [1..1] status with data type Code
The status of the 2507 exam request. Possible values are NEW; PENDING, REPORTED; PENDING, SCHEDULED; RELEASED TO RO, NOT PRINTED; FOR COMPLETED, PRINTED BY RO; CANCELLED BY MAS; CANCELLED BY RO; TRANSCRIBED; FOR NEW, TRANSFERRED IN; COMPLETED, TRANSFERRED OUT etc.

Contains exactly one [1..1] requestingLocation, where its type is Institution
The name of the regional office that entered the request.

Contains zero or more [0..*] knownDisability, where its type is Disability Observation
Other known disabilities or those stated by the veteran.

Contains zero or more [0..*] exam, where its type is Cand P Exam Event
The 2507 exam event.

Contains exactly one [1..1] subject, where its type is Patient
The veteran for whom the 2507 exam has been requested
Contains zero or one [0..1] routingLocation, where its type is Division
Contains exactly one [1..1] author, where its type is Individual Provider

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateApproved with data type Point In Time
The date/time exam results were approved.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateCompleted with data type Point In Time
The date the entire 2507 request was completed.

Contains exactly one [1..1] examType with data type Code
Contains the name of the exam for the 2507 request.

Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Code
"A unique identifier for the Act." (HL7 3.0)

Contains exactly one [1..1] priority with data type Code
The request reason for the 2507 exam to be conducted. Possible values are TERMINAL; POW; ORIGINAL SC; ORIGINAL NSC; INCREASE; REVIEW; OTHER; INSUFFICIENT EXAM etc.
Contains exactly one [1..1] remarks with data type String

Contains exactly one [1..1] requestDate with data type Point In Time
The date the 2507 request was entered.

Contains exactly one [1..1] status with data type Code
The status of the 2507 exam request. Possible values are NEW; PENDING, REPORTED; PENDING, SCHEDULED; RELEASED TO RO, NOT PRINTED; FOR COMPLETED, PRINTED BY RO; CANCELLED BY MAS; CANCELLED BY RO; TRANSCRIBED; FOR NEW, TRANSFERRED IN; COMPLETED, TRANSFERRED OUT etc.

Contains exactly one [1..1] requestingLocation, where its type is Institution
The name of the regional office that entered the request.

Contains zero or more [0..*] knownDisability, where its type is Disability Observation
Other known disabilities or those stated by the veteran.

Contains zero or more [0..*] exam, where its type is Cand P Exam Event
The 2507 exam event.

Contains exactly one [1..1] subject, where its type is Patient
The veteran for whom the 2507 exam has been requested
Contains zero or one [0..1] routingLocation, where its type is Division
Contains exactly one [1..1] author, where its type is Individual Provider
